New Records: Seth Lugo had his 19th quality start of the season, tying for third in the league, and led the majors with 179 innings pitched
Key Match Events: Jose Altuve hit a walk-off double in the ninth inning for the Astros' victory
Kyle Isbel broke up the no-hit attempt in the eighth inning with a single
Paul DeJong tied the game with a two-run homer in the ninth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Seth Lugo credited his preparation and adjustments for his performance
Royals showed resolve despite losing and the injury of Vinnie Pasquantino
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Astros' Framber Valdez threw seven no-hit innings
The game nearly went into a combined no-hitter until the eighth inning
Error by the Astros allowed the Royals to tie the game
